item.title: Flash Loans: An Initial Analysis
item.description: A flash loan is no-collateral loan existing over the span of a single transaction, allowing a contract to borrow funds, use funds, and repay the loan by the end of the same transaction. It’s like being a millionnaire for 15 seconds.
